wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Graham Smart (born 17 October 1958) is an English retired footballer. He played professionally for Plymouth Argyle, and Wigan Athletic before moving into non-league football to play for Folkestone Town and Hythe Town.In 2006, he was living in Dover and working as a bricklayer.
